page.title: 10Domesday Statistics 1
page.content: All the{families}in the school (over 120) were sent a Questionnaire. 87 forms were returned and some of the information gathered is shown below. (Some gave null answers sometimes). 98.85% of the families have a father, 93.10% a mother. 5.75% have 1 child, 60.92% 2{children,}26.44 3 children and 5.75 have 4 children. 4.6% had lived in Cuxton less than 1 year, 11.49% up to 5 years, 24.14% up to 10 years,51.72% up to 20 years and 8.05% over 20 years. 16.09 are originally from this area, 6.9% were married in the village and 13.79% parents attended Cuxton School. In 49.43% families both parents{work}and 79.31% {travel}to work by car,1.15% by bus, 5.75% by train, 2.3% by motor-cycle, 1.15% by bicycle and 5.75% on foot. 9.2% live in terraced houses, 78.16% semi-detached and 12.64% detached.
